snippet.title: Dead Wells Steam Wishlist Trailer! | The First Person Souls Like | Devlog videos soon
snippet.description:
Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2525660/Dead_Wells_The_Devil_Fragment/

Dead Wells: The Devil Fragment will be my first game ever on steam. If you like souls likes and action games your gonna love this game. Please Wishlist even if you don't plan on buying! Link above!

Game Devlogs will probably be coming soon to explain key things about this first person souls like I made in unity. Things such as combat, combos, health systems, rpg systems and other systems.

This game has a devil may cry like combo buffing system, air juggling, bosses, weapons, and leveling rpg system and much much more. It has the whole works. Its the first game I've created that truly feels like my own. This is basically the project that helped me learn the basics of code and I'm still learning while making it!

Thank you for watching don't forget to Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2525660/Dead_Wells_The_Devil_Fragment/

#gamedev #dreamgame  #gamedevlog  #steamgame #wishlist #soulslike #retrogaming #darksouls #eldenring #bloodborne #demonsouls #devlog #gamedevelopment #actionrpg #rpg #ps1 #n64
